features: LIGHTWEIGHT MOISTURIZING SHAMPOO: Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Shampoo (4 pack) leaves your hair feeling silky soft – without weighing it down
HYDRATING SHAMPOO & NOURISHING FOR DRY HAIR: Infused with our Pro-Moisture Complex, this shampoo for dry hair deeply nourishes so that hair feels smooth, soft and even more manageable
EVERYDAY CLEANSING MOISTURE SHAMPOO: This Dove Hydrating Shampoo is suitable for everyday hair care. And with a progressively nourishing formula, it cares for your hair from within
10X MORE RESILIENT TO DAILY HAIR DAMAGE: This Daily Moisture Shampoo and Conditioner system leaves hair 10x more resilient to daily damage from grooming and brushing vs. non-conditioning shampoo
HAIR NOURISHMENT: Over time this moisturizing shampoo and conditioner system nourishes dry hair from within. It hydrates and protects so that your hair stays more damage resistant
COMPLETE MOISTURE COLLECTION: Complement your Moisture Shampoo with our Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Conditioner for even more silky and manageable hair
body.description: To help prevent the damage done by daily wear and tear, Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Shampoo progressively cares for hair, leaving it feeling healthier when used as a part of a system along with Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Conditioner. After the very first wash, this moisturizing shampoo helps to nourish and protect your hair from daily aggression, giving you silky, soft hair that’s up to 10x more resilient when using system vs. non-conditioning shampoo. This Dove shampoo contains a unique formulation with Pro-Moisture Complex that smooths and progressively cares for hair deep inside. Even though you’ll notice you're looking smoother after the first wash, Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Shampoo continues to nourish hair after each application, helping to make your hair feel healthier wash after wash. Its nourishing formula helps to form a shield around the hair fiber to protect it from daily damage, maintaining your hair’s natural balance without weighing it down. After one shower, you’ll feel that your hair is silky to the touch and easy to manage. How to use: Apply Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Shampoo to wet hair, lather and rinse. For the best results, follow with Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner for soft and silky hair. Suitable for everyday use. Stock up with this 4-pack to ensure your hair stays bouncy and full.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo is a deeply nourishing shampoo to help give you silky and cared for hair, every day. This shampoo for dry hair nourishes hair from within, making it smooth, soft, and manageable.

Dove Daily Moisture Collection Dove is dedicated to providing superior nourishment solutions for hair. We create products with two-way care for instant and long term results. The Dove Difference Dove has always drawn inspiration from real, diverse women. We celebrate real beauty, which we define as feeling and looking your best. Pro-Moisture Complex This complex deeply nourishes your hair from within, hydrating and protecting so hair is more damage resistant. Dove Care Goes Beyond Your Hair This conditioner is certified cruelty-free by PETA and the bottle is recyclable and made from recycled plastics.

Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Conditioner Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Shampoo Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Conditioner Main Benefit Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Conditioner for dry hair nourishes hair from within, making it smooth, soft, manageable. Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo, with Keratin Repair Actives, helps to nourish hair, leaving it visibly repaired. Formulated with Keratin Repair Actives, Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner restores the appearance of damage on the surface of your hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dove shampoo bundle pack!
reviews.reviewText: GREAT DEAL! Save money buy this bundle pack! Dove is a great product, my hair smells good! Super clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo. It smells wonderful and has a good lather. My hair always smells so good after I use it.I always get the multi packs because they are a great value and that way I never run out. When I am down to my last bottle I just order more.The shampoo itself is very rich and creamy, kind of thick, and it only takes a little to wash my hair that is medium size length.I have very dry hair and this really helps to moisturize it as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dove Shampoo: Great Value, Great Clean, As Expected!
reviews.reviewText: Dove Shampoo has been a reliable choice for me, delivering great value without compromising on quality. It provides a thorough and effective clean, leaving my hair feeling fresh and revitalized, just as I expected. If you're seeking a shampoo that balances affordability with exceptional performance, this is a fantastic choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good!
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo smells so good! It will leave your hair very frizzy because it takes out all the oils. I would use it for a deep clean maybe once a week. I personally wouldn’t use it daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shampoo at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo! It makes my thick, wavy hair manageable better than anything else and doesn’t break the bank— especially when buying a pack like this. Great deal. Plus it smells great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More than enough!
reviews.reviewText: You would only need a tiny amount and it would lather! It is gentle and makes your hair soft and smell fresh!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
